name: Business Development Manager
description:
We are Kontakt, an IT company involved in the development of software for international FinTech clients. We provide end-to-end services (from the design of solution and software development to big data analysis and machine learning) and deliver smart solutions in the area of mortgage lending and loan business processes optimization.

We are looking for Business Development Manager with excellent organizational and interpersonal skills who is ready to jump into the new projects quickly.

Responsibilities:

  • develop long-term relationships with existing partners;
  • develop new companies in approved states and new contacts;
  • train clients on our processing and IT system;
  • troubleshoot all issues and assist the team with systemic problems;
  • provide update on performance issues;
  • stay in touch with client and discuss new opportunities to improve results.

Knowledge and Skills Required:

  • fluent in English is a must (excellent spoken and written communication skills);
  • education/work experience abroad is an advantage;
  • international sales, customer relationships or account management background;
  • dedicated passion for client service;
  • great teamwork and interpersonal skills;
  • multi-tasking, ability to work under pressure;
  • organized, disciplined, and accountable for result.

We offer:

  • amazing atmosphere in a team of like-minded people, who strive to grow up in a professional way;
  • perfect opportunity to improve your English with native speakers;
  • late start of the working day;
  • everything you need for comfortable work: competitive salary (totally white), official employment according to Russian labor legislation, fixed working schedule (5/2), comfortable office with good transport accessibility, corporate training system (paid internship), the possibility of continuous development and local training.
